item.title: ARM Support: Velero, Longhorn and the AWS-EBS-CSI-Driver
item.description: Welcome to the blog! This is the first post and I wanted to talk about the initial projects started in the github projects. Velero ARM Support Currently Velero represents the quintessential backup and restore tool for Kubernetes, but support for Velero on ARM didn’t exist so I created a project on github to cover an initial implementation. I created Pull Request #2227 to add the basic ARM builds needed to pull ARM images of Velero, and the follow up is to enable ARM support for the Velero AWS Plugin.
